name: Man O' Wasps: Kills The Golfers
name_original: Man O' Wasps: Kills The Golfers
description:
Aid the fledgling golf-slaying bio-colony, Man O' Wasps, with the miracle of movement as it brings about an end of existence to the loathsome golfing community. Kill them quickly before the virulent ameba-brained trash have the whole world turned into one exquisitely maintained 18 continent golf course.

CONTROLS:

Game pad is recommended. Xinput controllers are supported, dinput controllers are not.

Man O' Wasps: Kills the Golfers is a relaxing arcade action platformer video game. High scoring is encouraged since points double as HP. Reach the end of a course to unlock new playable Game Overs, where one shall discover the true extent of the golfer's evil (Not seen in this prototype)

This is my first attempt at developing a game. Everything you see is a development-in-progress, with only a rough idea of what the final .exe will be like.

NOTE: The creator holds no enmity towards golfers in real life, and does not support murder attempts upon such people.
